titleInfo.title: First Performance at the Renovated University Theater

mods.abstract: Performers from the first performance in Christian Brothers University's renovated University Theater took their bows.
mods.accessCondition: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law.
